summary: Provides a Braintrust integration for the LiteLLM library, capturing request and response details of LLM calls and sending them as events to the Braintrust API. Handles automatic creation of default projects and experiments, supports both synchronous and asynchronous logging, and manages authentication, payload formatting, and error handling.
business_intent: Allows developers to monitor, audit, and analyze LLM usage and performance through Braintrust, facilitating cost tracking, debugging, compliance, and data-driven improvements.
